00020 #ifndef _RTDM_DEVICE_H
00021 #define _RTDM_DEVICE_H
00022 
00023 #include <xenomai/nucleus/pod.h>
00024 #include <xenomai/rtdm/rtdm_driver.h>
00025 #include <linux/sem.h>
00026 
00027 
00028 #define DEF_DEVNAME_HASHTAB_SIZE    256 /* entries in name hash table */
00029 #define DEF_PROTO_HASHTAB_SIZE      256 /* entries in protocol hash table */
00030 
00031 
00032 extern struct semaphore nrt_dev_lock;
00033 extern xnlock_t         rt_dev_lock;
00034 
00035 extern unsigned int     devname_hashtab_size;
00036 extern unsigned int     protocol_hashtab_size;
00037 
00038 extern struct list_head *rtdm_named_devices;
00039 extern struct list_head *rtdm_protocol_devices;
00040 
00041 
00042 int rtdm_no_support(void);
00043 
00044 struct rtdm_device *get_named_device(const char *name);
00045 struct rtdm_device *get_protocol_device(int protocol_family, int socket_type);
00046 
00047 static inline void rtdm_dereference_device(struct rtdm_device *device)
00048 {
00049     atomic_dec(&device->reserved.refcount);
00050 }
00051 
00052 int __init rtdm_dev_init(void);
00053 
00054 static inline void rtdm_dev_cleanup(void)
00055 {
00056     kfree(rtdm_named_devices);
00057     kfree(rtdm_protocol_devices);
00058 }
00059 
00060 #endif /* _RTDM_DEVICE_H */
